attributes.action: Give Ringo Star a Knighthood before it is too late
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give Ringo Star a Knighthood before it is too late.  He was one of the fab four and has been overlooked in the Honours list. He contributed to their unique status and therefore deserves the same recognition as the others.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
